entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
